column6: "DESCENT" PART 5 (OF 5): WHICH HEROES WILL JOIN THE MASTERS OF EVIL? - Baron Zemo has made our young superhumans an offer they can't refuse-or can they? - Who agrees to join the Masters of Evil-and who goes rogue? 32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Dennis Hopeless | penciller (cover):Francesco Mattina | artist:Kev Walker
